case.title: FWB dinner etc - 39 (Berkshire, Surrey, London)
case.text: I am a sporty guy who enjoys the gym three times a week and have a lot of energy for indoor sport too. I am looking to meet a nice charming lady for the purpose of being FWB, This will include going for drinks, meals and spending quality time in doors too. If you are interested in meeting me please send your details, pictures and phone number. Only genuine women please apply.
